name: Logitech Z130 5 W Speakers
Features: [Cable length: Right-to-left cable: 1.3 m (4.2 ft.), Audio-in cable: 1.5 m (4.9 ft.), Power adapter cable: 1.8 m (5.9 ft.), With five watts of total power, you get sound that’s clear and strong., It’s a snap to get the sound you want with simple volume and power controls., Plug in your headphones and listen to your music, movies and games where and when you want to., Just connect the speakers to your laptop with a standard 3.5 mm plug and you’re ready to go.]
